description:
Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates offer Luffy a submarine escape route, Blackbeard continues his reckless rampage, and a puny pink-hair marine changes the world with a scream!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisshi no Sakebi: Unmei o Kaeru Yuuki Aru Suubyou
Pochi secondi che cambiano il destino
The Desperate Scream! Courageous Moments That Will Change the Future
Un cri éperdu. Quelques secondes de courage pour changer le destin
Отчаянный зов – миг отваги, изменяющий судьбу
صراخ يائس! لحظات شجاعة ستغيّر المستقبل!
必死の叫び 運命を変える勇気ある数秒
